projects.role: Procedural Game Level Design to Trigger Spatial Exploration (C#, Unity)
description: Group research project
Development through Unity and Unity assets resources.
Procedural content generation by instancing the game assets level.
Automatically synthesizing game levels in order to encourage designer-specified exploration goals.
The game is developed using Unity 2D.
The game level is generated through selected rules and constrains.
The chunks are placed ramdonly each time the player move around the level.
The procedural content generation features are implemented to do an infinitely playable level with different difficulties

projects.role: Virtual Reality Social space (C#, Unity, XR toolkit)
description: XR player prefab instancing.
Photon Network connection and Voice room.
Dart Game interaction, such as grab and throw infinity darts.
Sound effects for indicated user coins.
The game is developed using WebGL instead of OpenGL for web browser support.
Camera can be controlled by mouse and/or keyboard input.
Collision detection and reaction: Bullets has collisions and has sound when collides with walls and enemies.
Texture use for the floor, walls, enemies, character guns (can be change by keyboard), and bullet.
Sounds used as background can me play and multiple soundtracks were added. Sounds effects for the shoot of a gun, the bullet collision, and the enemy death.
Blueprint programming.
Puzzles implementation and game level design.
Usage of Procedural content for platforms puzzles.
